name: True North Butter Tart Mix (Pack of 2)
summary: Rich, gooey, and oh-so-indulgent, butter tarts are a delectable addition to every holiday spread! A Canadian classic (butter tarts go way back to 1900!), we’ve made them modern: quick to bake, gluten-free (depending on the tart shells you use), and sugar-conscious. Try them this holiday season, and we bet they’ll soon become a holiday tradition!
